d:testDescription.p: The test case constructs a filter that uses feTile to tile the entire specified filter region. The tile consists of a green rectangle over a larger transparent rectangle. The green rectangle is created with feFlood and feOffset. There is also a semi-transparent blue rectangle that should exactly cover one of the tiled rectangles, creating a purple tile with a black stroke (4 tiles down and 3 across).
The test uses the 'rect' element, feTile, feFlood, feOffset, feMerge, fill style, stroke, font-family and font-size properties.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: The rendered picture should match the reference image, except for possible variations in the labelling text (per CSS2 rules).

g.text: feTile filter test: a tiled pattern
